message: Hi Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on something really valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $90.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $80. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $80?
Thanks for your offer, Bob! I understand that $80 is a great price, but I was thinking more along the lines of $85. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell it to you for $85.

I'm still interested in the product, but $85 is a bit too high for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer, so I'll make a new offer of $77.50. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $77.50?

I understand that $77.50 is a good offer, but I'm not willing to go that low. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer, so I'll make a new offer of $82.50. It's a compromise, but I think it's a fair price for both of us.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $82.50 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to go up to $80, but I'm not sure I can go any higher. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $80?
